alert.note: Alert for Clay; Pickett (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:46PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OVERTON...PICKETT...NORTHEASTERN CLAY AND NORTHWESTERN FENTRESS COUNTIES... At 246 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Livingston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Jamestown, Byrdstown and Pall Mall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
